suppress.notes: This suppresses an issue in Guava which affects up to version >24.1.1 however currently we require version 20.0 as spring fox swagger depends on it

The HTTP client in the Build tool in Gradle before 5.6 sends authentication credentials originally destined for the configured host. If that host returns a 30x redirect, Gradle also sends those credentials to all subsequent hosts that the request redirects to.
This appears to be a false-positive as this is only exploitable in Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE which we don't use
